titles.title: Recognizing the long and mutually-beneficial relationship between the United States and France and congratulating France's President-elect Nicolas Sarkozy on his victory in the May 6, 2007, Presidential election.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/14/2007--Introduced. Recognizes the long and mutually-beneficial relationship between the United States and France. Congratulates France's President-elect Nicolas Sarkozy on his victory in the Presidential election held on May 6, 2007.
